xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.2 Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.2.3 Abyākatapada » 2.2.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
23.
1300Sahetuko abyākato dhammo sahetukassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
24.
1301Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1302Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1303Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1304(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1305Sahetukadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetu-ārammaṇaup2.3 Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika >>
